name: Spider Drake
movement: climb 40 ft., fly 80 ft., walk 40 ft.
description: The Spider Drake is a large dragon with a combination of scales and webs, showcasing a predatory appearance with venomous attributes.
memorable: Its Sticky Secretions ability makes melee attackers vulnerable to being restrained by the drake's webbing.
goals: The Spider Drake seeks to ambush prey and assert dominance in its territory.
relations: It may be encountered alongside other dragons or as a guardian of its lair.
environment: Typically found in rugged, mountainous areas or dark forests where it can use its climbing and flying abilities.
strengths: High armor class and hit points; formidable poison breath weapon; expert ambusher with stealth.
weaknesses: Low intelligence and charisma limit tactical options; reliant on melee engagement for advantage.
attacks: Can make multiple attacks including a venomous bite and slashing claw strikes.
most_powerful_ability: Poison Breath, an area attack that deals substantial poison damage and can inflict the poisoned condition.
senses: Possesses blindsight up to 30 feet, granting it awareness of its surroundings without sight.
skills: Proficient in perception and survival, enabling it to track and ambush effectively.
additional_information: Immune to poison damage and the poisoned condition.
Web ability can restrain targets at range, creating strategic challenges.
Vulnerable webbing to fire damage while immune to psychic damage.
Can engage in airborne combat thanks to its flight speed.
Relatively slow intelligence hampers its strategic capabilities.
